intro: Pilumna laxa, commonly known as the slender pilumna, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It belongs to the family Acanthaceae and is characterized by its upright, branched stems and small, tubular flowers. The leaves are opposite, ovate, and often have a slight pubescence.
